page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{MR CABOT.By Leon and Mathew.
MR CABOT is about 60-70 years old. He dosen't walk very much and he's got a walking stick.He mostly drives his car around.He never comes to the village fetes I think he's quite lonely.He has a very big garden and a big house.He has a gardener called Michael. Mr Cabot goes to church most Sundays.His house is 46 years old.He has two children and three animals which are one dog and two cats.His dog is called Cherry. I don't know the name of the cats. Mr Cabot started school when he was five years old.He left school when he was 17 years old.We asked him if he had any favorite teachers when he was at school and he said NO.
